nodes.label: Chlorobium tepidum
nodes.description: A green sulfur bacterium analyzed for photosynthesis-related gene sequences.

nodes.label: Chloroflexus aurantiacus
nodes.description: A green nonsulfur bacterium studied for its photosynthetic capabilities.

nodes.label: Bacteriochlorophyll Biosynthesis
nodes.description: The biosynthetic pathway for bacteriochlorophyll, identified as predating chlorophyll biosynthesis.

nodes.label: Chlorophyll Biosynthesis
nodes.description: The biosynthetic pathway for chlorophyll, which evolved after bacteriochlorophyll biosynthesis.

nodes.label: Photosynthetic Electron Transfer
nodes.description: The process of electron transfer during photosynthesis, linked to the identified gene sequences.

nodes.label: Gene Sequences
nodes.description: 31 open reading frames related to photosynthesis identified within 100 kb of genomic sequence.

nodes.label: Phylogenetic Analysis
nodes.description: Analytical methods used to determine evolutionary relationships among photosynthetic organisms.

nodes.label: Heliobacteria
nodes.description: Bacteria identified as closest to the last common ancestor of all oxygenic photosynthetic lineages.

nodes.label: Purple Bacteria
nodes.description: Identified as the earliest emerging photosynthetic lineage in the study.

nodes.label: Green Sulfur Bacteria
nodes.description: Bacteria that are closely related to green nonsulfur bacteria, according to phylogenetic analyses.

nodes.label: Green Nonsulfur Bacteria
nodes.description: Bacteria that are closely related to green sulfur bacteria, as indicated by phylogenetic studies.

nodes.label: 16S rRNA Analysis
nodes.description: Previous method used to analyze evolutionary relationships among phototrophic organisms.

nodes.label: Hsp60/Hsp70 Analysis
nodes.description: Previous analysis method that suggested alternative evolutionary relationships among bacteria.

nodes.label: Granick Hypothesis
nodes.description: Hypothesis suggesting chlorophyll biosynthesis predates bacteriochlorophyll biosynthesis, challenged by this study.

nodes.label: Oxygenic Photosynthesis
nodes.description: Photosynthesis process that produces oxygen, linked to the evolutionary history explored in the study.

nodes.label: Evolutionary History of Photosynthesis
nodes.description: The study's focus on the early evolution of photosynthesis and its key pathways.

nodes.label: Molecular Evidence
nodes.description: Evidence derived from gene sequences that reshapes understanding of photosynthesis evolution.

nodes.label: Photosynthetic Life Development
nodes.description: Insights into the development of photosynthetic organisms on Earth based on the study's findings.

nodes.label: Common Ancestor of Photosynthetic Lineages
nodes.description: The last common ancestor from which all oxygenic photosynthetic lineages evolved.

nodes.label: Evolutionary Relationships
nodes.description: The connections and lineage divergences among various photosynthetic organisms.

is the earliest emerging lineage among
is linked to the evolutionary history of
